author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Union Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) has directed the Government of Puducherry to immediately relieve Chandraker Bharti, Finance Secretary, from Puducherry to enable him to join the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi (GNCTD).

The Ministry passed an order stating that the Joint-Cadre Authority Arunachal Pradesh-Goa-Mizoram and Union Territory (AGMU) cadre had approved of the transfer of the IAS officer from Puducherry to GNCTD.

The Joint Cadre Authority of AGMU cadre has also issued orders transferring Jokey Angu, an IAS officer from Puducherry, to Arunachal Pradesh. Another IAS officer P.S. Reddy from Puducherry has been transferred to Goa while P. Jawahar has been transferred from Andaman and Nicobar Islands to Puducherry.

Shifted from Goa to Puducherry

Arun L. Dessai has been shifted from Goa to Puducherry.
title: MHA directs Govt. to relieve IAS officer
